name: Running To Where?
description:
Running To Where?

This is a simple Side-Scroller game developed by Niyazi Berkay Çokuysal. 

The goal of Running To Where is the collect the highest score possible. There are multiple ways to get the highest score but be careful, your challenges will design according to your gameplay strategy.

This game includes;

  • Paragon Phase and Animation Editing
  • Infinitely Spawn Platform Pieces and Rules
  • Custom Footstep Effects and Attack Particles
  • Double Jump with Animations
  • Turret AI and Custom Turret Fire
  • Cel Shader Effect
  • 3D Main Menu Design
  • Save/Load System for High Score
  • Infinitely Spawn Background
  • Resolution and Sound Settings in Options
  • Usage of Quixel Bridge and Megascans
  • Environment Enhancement with Post-Processing
  • Timer and FPS Display
  • Ultra Dynamic Sky
